DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Campath-1H induction therapy and the associated lymphocyte depletion will permit long-term, rejection free renal allograft function in the absence of maintenance calcineurin inhibitor (CI) therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Campath-1H Induction to Allow Discontinuation of Calcineurin Inhibitors After Renal Transplantation
DOC.criteria: received a renal transplant, induction with Campath1H, and at least 2 months of calcineurin inhibitor therapy, CellCept, and prednisone. Recipients of HLAidentical livingdonor renal transplants; PRA value >20% within 30 days of transplant; GFR <40ml/min; multiorgan transplant;
